isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - MANIFOLDS - INTAKE MANIFOLD - INSTALLATION

step1.para: Using a new gasket, install the intake manifold as follows:

note.para: IF INSTALLING A NEW INTAKE MANIFOLD, BE SURE YOU SELECT THE CORRECT MANIFOLD FOR THE APPLICATION. THE DT-466 GENERALLY USES A MANIFOLD WITH A 2-1/4" DIAMETER AIR INLET HOLE BUT MAY HAVE A 3-1/4" DIAMETER AIR INLET HOLE. THE DTA-466 USES A MANIFOLD WITH A 3-1/4" DIAMETER AIR INLET HOLE. MEASURE THE AIR INLET HOLE DIAMETER IF IN DOUBT. REFER TO FIGURE 3.1.

step2.para: Assure gasket alignment with bolt holes and install "patch bolts" and washers. Tighten to the specified special torque.

note.para: #4 cylinder bottom bolt incorporates fuel return tube clamp with spacer.

step2.para: Install the clamps, washers, spacers and fuel return tube. Tighten the "patch bolts" and "patch" stud bolt to the specified special torque.

step1.para: Reinstall the aneroid tube using new rubber sealing sleeve, if equipped.
